articles.title: EMUI 12 RoadMap Asia Pacific: Eligible Devices and Rollout Dates - HC Newsroom
articles.description: Huawei’s EMUI 12 is based on Android and inspired by HarmonyOS software, which means that it is the most advanced version in the EMUI series. However, the Chinese tech maker has introduced this software version for global Huawei device users. The initial EMUI…
articles.content: Great! Huawei has started delivering the EMUI 12 beta builds for the Huawei P30 Lite NE (New Edition) smartphone, which has its own user base. The EMUI 12 beta update brings a giant changelog to prov… [+3021 chars]

articles.title: Experiences of and attitudes towards HIV testing for Asian, Black and Latin American men who have sex with men (MSM) in the SELPHI (HIV Self‐Testing Public Health Intervention) randomized controlled trial in England and Wales: implications for HIV self-te - BMC Public Health
articles.description: Background HIV self-testing (HIVST) could play an important role in improving access to testing and therefore reducing inequalities related to late diagnosis of HIV, while also improving access to HIV prevention interventions such as HIV pre-exposure prophyla…

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: No more Covid-19 tests for vaccinated travellers entering Singapore from April 26 - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Travellers fully vaccinated against Covid-19 will no longer need to take any Covid-19 tests to enter Singapore from next Tuesday (April 26).
articles.content:

articles.title: Why Chen Hanwei doesn't think a Will Smith moment will ever happen to him at the Star Awards - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actor is hosting the live Star Awards show on Apr 24 all on his own, and he’s a little nervous about it. But he seems pretty confident about who he thinks will win in the acting categories.
articles.content: They lied to me, saying they wanted to me to attend a meeting to discuss the second season of (variety show) Away With My BFF, he told CNA Lifestyle. I wore a T-shirt and shorts to that meeting. And … [+1062 chars]
